body_html:
Again not disputing that works and I'm largely aware of methods like that, its just largely round about which seems like a bad api to me.

Edit: I'm also not insinuating that my work around that I'm using at the moment is not largely roundabout. My main point is that any work around that exists for this is wonky and indirect which to me is not great given there is what I think a clear path to a satisfactory resolution.

body:
Again not disputing that works and I'm largely aware of methods like that, its just largely round about which seems like a bad api to me.  

Edit: I'm also not insinuating that my work around that I'm using at the moment is not largely roundabout. My main point is that any work around that exists for this is wonky and indirect which to me is not great given there is what I think a clear path to a satisfactory resolution.
